question:
Consider the following statements about SAARC Seed Bank Agreement:
  1. The SAARC SeedBank Agreement will help the countries to increase their seed replacement rate
  2. India has still not ratified the agreement
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>Second statement is incorrect</u> because India has already ratified the agreement in 2011. The South Asian leaders endorsed a SAARC Seed Bank Agreement in the 17th SAARC Summit in Maldives (2011).
